controls.label: Block Sensitive Files
controls.help: Prevents public access to wp-config.php, readme.html, and log files.

controls.label: Operational Notes
controls.default_value: This feature uses .htaccess rules to return a 403 Forbidden status for sensitive files. Ensure your server runs Apache.

mappings.block_sensitive_files:
<FilesMatch "^(wp-config\.php|readme\.html|license\.txt|debug\.log|error\.log)">
    <IfModule mod_authz_core.c>
        Require all denied
    </IfModule>
    <IfModule !mod_authz_core.c>
        Order allow,deny
        Deny from all
    </IfModule>
</FilesMatch>
